title: Nice Day
subtitle: Old & New Best ”XTrack“ Compiled
author: XTrack Team

text.text: Amore x Dinamarca - Vagabon - Hare Squad - Speech Debelle - Metro Boomin x James Blake x Don Toliver x Wizkid x Beam x Toian - Bakar - Yaya Bey - Neil Francis x PawPaw Rod - Raury - DJ Tunez x Amexin - Gorilaz x Bad Bunny - Wizkid x Major Lazer - Ami Faku x Gallo Remixed x Black Coffee - Victony x Rema x Tempoe x Don Toliver - PawPaw Rod - Aminé x Kaytranada x Pharrell Williams - FKJ - Juls x Baby Son - Ghetto Boy - The Cavemen - Crayon x Bella Smurda - Major Lazer x Major League Djz x Bianca Costa x Tiwa Savage x DJ Maphorisa x Julio Masidi - Kida Kudz - Blaq Jerzee x Tekno - Biig Piig - PinkPantheress x Ice Spice - Swae Lee x Drake
